column4: 3 issues. 1. My top and bottom panels keep disappearing, everytime I have to rename .gnome2 and restart gdm to get them work. 2. Mic doesn't work if I close volume manager. The mic section gets muted again if I close volume manager. 3. Fonts of applications in wine are not appearing correctly though I install corefonts using winetricks.
did you select auto hide on panels?
they actually crash...i tried killall gnome-panel, it worked, but when  try to start gnome-panel again, there is already one running, I do kill -9, but then I can't start gnome-panel
